reviews.productTitle: 4 Pack Illuminated Light Switch, Lightswitch with LED Night Light, Automatic On/Off Sensor, Single Pole Switch, 15Amp 120/277Volt,White
reviews.text: We added a few of these to our new home because we couldn't find the light switches in the dark. We installed them with the light down. Out of the 4 lights, one of them has a slight flickering effect. The other three work great. The one that flickers still works but I will have to replace it. These have a nice modern look and help our guests find the light when using the bathroom and provide a little light to help navigate. I would recommend to others but be ready to deal with some of them not functioning and either prepare for return or buy additional. You might want to test these prior to installation to not get in the trap that I did.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2024
reviews.title: Cool lights but buy extra because they don't all work

reviews.productTitle: 4 Pack Illuminated Light Switch, Lightswitch with LED Night Light, Automatic On/Off Sensor, Single Pole Switch, 15Amp 120/277Volt,White
reviews.text: The light on this contraption shines UP against the wall as if illuminating a painting and blinds you as you pass by it at 3am on the way to the toilet, squinting from its burning glare and raising your hands in front of your face protectively like a vampire accidentally waking during the day. It should be pointed DOWN to illuminate your path. You might comment "Well then why not install it upside down so the light indeed faces the way you wish?" To which I would reply "Are you mad? A switch must toggle up for on and down for off... to do otherwise would be chaos unbound!"
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2024
reviews.title: Blinding light not useful illumination

reviews.productTitle: 4 Pack Illuminated Light Switch, Lightswitch with LED Night Light, Automatic On/Off Sensor, Single Pole Switch, 15Amp 120/277Volt,White
reviews.text: After a few months of use and 2 of 4 installed one had to be removed due to malfunction. Turned on randomly and sparking when switching off. The other switch seems to be ok. Just beware of possible issues.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2024
reviews.title: Sparks

reviews.productTitle: 4 Pack Illuminated Light Switch, Lightswitch with LED Night Light, Automatic On/Off Sensor, Single Pole Switch, 15Amp 120/277Volt,White
reviews.text: It is very practical and everyone is impressed with the night light. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is that I bought 4 of these, but one didn’t work. The problem is that I missed the return date, so if you buy it, install it as soon as possible just in case. Note: The one that didn’t work properly has a faulty night light. It turns on and off but the little night light doesn't work.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2024
reviews.title: Easy to install it

reviews.productTitle: 4 Pack Illuminated Light Switch, Lightswitch with LED Night Light, Automatic On/Off Sensor, Single Pole Switch, 15Amp 120/277Volt,White
reviews.text: Yes, the insulation is easy. Shut off the power remove the old one and install the new one close it turn back on the power and flip the switch. It’s easy and no longer needing night lights around the house. Great idea thanks.!!

reviews.text: This light is very dim. The light only points up unless you want your switch to be upside down (ie you push the switch down to turn it on) so if that will bother you especially of next to another switch to not match (ex the bathroom fan) get the switch plate style of light. If my return window hadn't have already closed I could return these.

reviews.title: Very dim, only points up
